title: How does chemical energy affect our lives? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every flick of an eyelash requires chemical energy. every heartbeat and every breath. There is no singing or vision without it. No muscle activity at all occurs without it. And your car won’t start and the cellphone won’t play without chemical energy.
Simply stated if biochemical processes, which keep you and all your cells alive, allowing you to grow, thrive and exist, were not possible you would not be alive or exist.
